title: Notice to start of work: The owner shall give notice to the Commissioner of his intention to start work on the building site in the format given in Annexure 13 The owner may start the work after 7 days have elapsed from the date of the service of such notice to the Commissioner or earlier, if so permitted
clause_text: Notice to start of work: The owner shall give notice to the Commissioner of his intention to start work on the building site in the format given in Annexure 13 The owner may start the work after 7 days have elapsed from the date of the service of such notice to the Commissioner or earlier, if so permitted.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Notice to start of work: The owner shall give notice to the Commissioner of his intention to start work on the building site in the format given in Annexure 13 The owner may start the work after 7 day
